content:
# tag 확인 방법

git tag


# tag 긋기

git tag -a {tag} -m {message}
git tag -a submissions/ccic.34 -m "submissions/ccic.34"

git tag -a submissions/131.acp.1 -m "submissions/131.acp.1"
git tag -a versions/11.0.0 -m "versions/11.0.0"


# tag push

git push origin refs/tags/submissions/tag이름
git push origin refs/tags/submissions/131.acp.1
git push origin refs/tags/versions/11.0.0


# tag 값 확인 하기

git ls-remote --tags | grep {keyword}
git ls-remote --tags | grep submissions/ccic.34


또는

git show-ref {tag}

git show-ref submissions/ccic.34

# SMB 또는 Windows 공유폴더
net use N: \\10.158.4.128\ivi5 비밀번호 /user:kyusoo.kim /persistent:no

# vBee 연결

net use z: \\sshfs.kr\worker@kyusoo-kim-acp-1-0.vbee.lge.com!35756\home\worker\build-acp

# 네트워크 드라이브 삭제
net use /delete z:

Browser Test
luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.applicationManager/launch '{"id":"com.webos.app.browser","params":{"target":"https://Fast.com","pwaMode":true, "nonUiMode":true,"nrcuMode":false}}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/variant/getVariant '{"key":"GENERAL_VEHICLE"}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/variant/getVariant '{"key":"GENERAL_REGION"}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/variant/getVariant '{"key":"GENERAL_BRAND"}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/variant/getVariant '{"key":"PLATFORM_TYPE"}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.applicationManager/listApps '{}'
luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.applicationmanager/listApps '{}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.applicationManager/listPackages '{}'

luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.applicationManager/getAppInfo '{"id":"com.webos.app.discovery"}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.sdx/send '{}'

luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.sdx/getServer '{}'
luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.sdx/setServer '{"serverIndex":"QA2"}'
luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.sdx/setServer '{"serverIndex":"QA"}'
luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.sdx/setServer '{"serverIndex":"Production"}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.applicationmanager/listLaunchPoints '{}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/variant/getVariant '{"key":"CCS"}'

luna-send -f -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.pkgUpdate/statusAll '{"dependency":true, "subscribe":true}'

luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.appInstallService/status '{}'
luna-send -f -i luna://com.webos.appInstallService/installLocal '{ "id":"APP ID", "ipkUrl":"IPK File Path", "target":{"deviceId":"INTERNAL_STORAGE","share":true},"subscribe":true}'
luna-send -f -i luna://com.webos.appInstallService/installLocal '{ "id":"com.my.test117", "ipkUrl":"/var/log/com.my.test117_1240431_1.0.0_1718085018408_drm.ipk", "target":{"deviceId":"INTERNAL_STORAGE","share":true},"subscribe":true}'

// Decrypt 시에 항상 /home/root 위치에 ipk 가 있어야 함.
luna-send -f -i luna://com.webos.service.sm/crypto/decryptIpk '{"encryptedFilePath":"/home/root/38193180.ipk", "decryptedFilePath":"/home/root/38193180_dec.ipk", "removeEncryptedFile":true, "subscribe":true}'

luna-send -f -i luna://com.webos.appInstallService/installLocal '{ "id":"com.test.acp.list", "ipkUrl":"/var/log/com.test.acp.list_1.0.7_all.ipk", "target":{"deviceId":"INTERNAL_STORAGE","share":true},"subscribe":true}'
luna-send -i -f luna://com.webos.appInstallService/dev/install '{"id":"com.test.acp.list", "ipkUrl":"/var/log/com.test.acp.list_1.0.7_all.ipk","subscribe":true}'|


luna-send -i -f luna://com.webos.appInstallService/dev/install '{"id":"com.test.acp.list", "ipkUrl":"/var/log/com.test.acp.list_1.0.6_all.ipk","subscribe":true}'

luna-send -i -f luna://com.webos.appInstallService/dev/install '{"id":"com.test.acp", "ipkUrl":"/var/log/com.test.acp_1.0.0_all.ipk","subscribe":true}'

luna-send -i -f luna://com.webos.appInstallService/install '{"id":"com.test.acp.list", "ipkUrl":"/var/log/com.test.acp.list_1.0.7_all.ipk","subscribe":true}'


luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.applicationManager/launch '{"id":"com.test.acp"}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/theme/getTheme '{}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/region/getRegion '{}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/getWebosForegroundStatus '{}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.bootManager/getBootStatus '{}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.sdx/getCountryList '{}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/variant/getVariant '{"key":"SW.FEATURE_WIRELESS_CP_AA"}' // value 못 받음.


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/network/getHostStatus '{}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/network/getNetworkStatus  '{}' -> Not Responding in ccNC

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.connectionmanager/getstatus '{}'

luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/time/getTimeSource '{}'




luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test","value": [0]}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test","value": [1]}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test","value": [0, 1, 2, 3]}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test","value": [1, 2, 3, 0]}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test","value": [2, 3, 0, 1]}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test","value": [3, 2, 1, 0]}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/getAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "test"}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "temp","value": [0]}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/getAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "temp"}'


luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/setAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "dummy","value": {}}'
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.palm.preferences/appProperties/getAppProperty '{"appId":"com.webos.app.home","key": "dummy"}'

webOS 빌드 버전 확인
luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.preferences/systemProperties/getSysProperty '{"key": "com.palm.properties.buildNumber"}'


언어 (Host)
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.settingsservice/getSystemSettings  '{"keys":["localeInfo"]}'

국가 설정
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.settingsservice/getSystemSettings '{"subscribe":true, "keys":["smartServiceCountryCode3"],"category":"option"}'

향지
luna-send -n 1 luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/region/getRegion '{}'



luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.sdx/send '{"serviceName":"sdp_secure","url":"country","methodType":"REQ_SSL_GET_METHOD"}'

luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.sdx/getHttpHeaderForServiceRequest '{}'

luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.palm.tempdb/find '{"query":{"select":["lastPageInfo"],"from":"com.webos.app.discovery.lastPage:1"}}'


 
 팝업 (Host)
 
 luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/showPopup '{"visibility":true,"button":[{"text":"OK","btnId":"button1"}],"message":"Please check the network connection.","subscribe":true}'
 luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.hccmanager/showPopup '{"visibility":true,"button":[{"text":"button","btnId":"button1"}],"message":"Test Message (Popup)","subscribe":true}'
 
 토스트 (webOS)
 luna://com.webos.notification/createToast '{"title": "Installing","sourceId": "com.webos.app.discovery","message": "hello world","onclick": {"appId": "com.webos.app.discovery","params": {"query": "category/GAME_APPS/APPUPDATES"}},"iconUrl": "/mnt/otncabi/usr/palm/applications/com.webos.app.discovery/lgstore.png","noaction": false,"persistent": true,"type": "advanced"}'
 
 Alert (WebOS)
 
 luna-send -n 1 -f -a com.webos.app.test luna://com.webos.notification/createAlert '{"title":"Test", "message":"hello world", "buttons":[{"label":"button1", "onclick":"luna://com.webos.service.applicationmanager/launch", "params": {"id":"youtube.leanback.v4"}}]}'
 luna-send -n 1 -f -a com.webos.app.test luna://com.webos.notification/createAlert '{"title":"Test Title", "message":"Test Message (Alert)", "buttons":[{"label":"button", "focus":true}]}'
 
 
 Reboot( webOS )
 luna-send -f -n l luna://com.webos.service.tvpower/power/reboot '{"reason":"swDownload"}'
 
 네트워크
 luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.connectionmanager/setstate '{"isInternetConnectionAvailable":true}'
 luna-send -n 1 -f luna://com.webos.service.connectionmanager/setstate '{"isInternetConnectionAvailable":false}'

Next.js 빌드 방법

$ npm run build
$ npm start
